violations: Worker in proximity to operating machine without visible safety measures
General clutter that could block pathways
locations: Near the large machine in the upper left
Floor area near the large CNC machine
recommendations: Ensure all workers wear hard hats at all times in the work area.
Provide and require the use of high-visibility safety vests for all workers.
Ensure workers near operating machinery wear appropriate PPE and follow proper safety protocols.
Clear the floor of unnecessary items and organize equipment to keep pathways clear.
worker_positions: One worker near the large machine in upper left
One worker standing near bottom right corner

worker_identifiers.features: Blue shirt, no hard hat or vest
